item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:03 UTC – Details)



【Upgrade 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station】Wireless Charging Station for Apple products,Saves your costs.Fast 3 in 1 charging station is equal to one charging station for iWatch, one Phone charging stand, 1 charging dock for AirPods. Wide compatibility to cover all IOS devices, Compatible with iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 mini/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XR/XS MAX/X/8/8Plus & iWatch SE/6/5/4/3/2 & AirPods Pro/3/2/1. A must device for apple fans.
【Simplify Charging,Simplified Life】Only need one cable to charge for iphone, apple watch and airpods simultaneously, bring you an effortless charging experience, no more tangled cords trouble.Also, easy to find the “sweet spot” to charge, just simply place your phone on the stand and this wireless charger stand will do the rest. The Charging station for multiple devices apple is very suitable as a Christmas gift,Thanksgiving gift or birthday gift for friends.
【Intelligent Protection&Sleep Friendly Charging Pad】Our wireless charging stand with lightweight design, space saving,base with anti-slip silicone design so that the charger will not move or flip, to ensure that your phone is protected when charging; Besides, features a blue LED indicator when charging. If place this on nightstand, the blue light is a soft and not dazzing, virtually won’t lights up the entire room, no need to worry that it will prevent your sleep from being affected.
【What You Will Get】Our package includes 1* Wireless Charger iPhone,1*18W wall adapter,1*USB-C Charging Cable,1*User Manual,Worry-free 24-Month Warranty.One device allows you to have a clean desk and a beautiful smile,Please rest assured of the quality of our products that every product we send to you has gone through a series of quality inspection procedures. if you have any question on this wireless iphone charger, please contact us we will offer you a best solution within 24 hours.

Warranty & Support

Price: $16.99 - $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:49:38 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

Read more

Read more

The part 2 of the round hose is already attached to the round hose-Version 2

If you need to switch, you need to remove the part 2 and all flat hose, and then connect the Version 2

Read more

Read more

Product Description

The Moongo Tool UNIVERSAL SOCKET is a must have tool for both the professional and the average person. It instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance. A great gift idea for dad, mom, father, mother, friends and family.

mens christmas gifts

You won’t know they needed a MoongoTool Universal Socket until they have one!

Built for Durability

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

One Size Fits Most

The MoongoTool Universal Socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

You Got The Power

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

Loosen and tighten fasteners in seconds and get the job done even faster!

christmas gifts for men

Save Time And Money

Our innovative tool allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

No more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

The Perfect Gift for any Occasion!

The must have gift for the Father, Husband, Handyman, Guys, Boyfriend, Him, Do-It-Yourselfer, Boyfriend, Man or Woman.

This makes the perfect gift for the not-so-handy.

Suitable for DIY

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Trying to find a gift for someone that has every tool? Chances are they don’t have this!

UNIVERSAL SOCKET WRENCH can be adjusted to unscrew most metric, wing nuts, broken nuts, stripped nuts, eye bolts, square nuts, hexes, etc.unique design of the Hexagon and Spring Pins can be closely engaged with the parts, not easy to slip. Perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, automotive repair, and other household maintenance.
TOOS FOR MEN: Self-adjustable from standard 1/4in to 3/4in and metric 7mm to 19mm with over 130lbs of torque. Adapter turns your drill into a socket driver.
SPECIALLY MATERIAL: Durable chrome vanadium steel material, the hardness can reach 56HRC. We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly, Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!
GIFTS FOR MEN who have everything, a perfect gift for Father’s day/Mother’s day/Birthday/Valentines Day/Christmas/Anniversary /Halloween/Thanksgiving gifts etc. fathers day gifts for dad/grandpa/stepdad/hushand/brother from wife/daughter/son/girlfriend/kids. You won’t know you need universal socket until you have one! Make it yours now and make your life more easier.
UNCOMPROMISING CUSTOMER CARE: Any question, please feel free to contact us through Amazon,We will save your problem within 24 hours.We’d love to make you a perfect purchase experience!

Product Description

[ 4 Pack Lighted Gift Boxes，Premium Material] The package contains 4 pack light up Christmas gift boxes in 4 different sizes. Super large: 10*10*12inch, large: 8*8*10inch, medium: 6*6*8inch, small: 5*5*7inch. Each box is wrapped with yarn and glitter, and tied with a cute green, silver, red, or gold bow, pine cones and pine needles on the top. Copyright Certificated Model. Premium Material, these Xmas gift boxes are wrapped by Glittering yarn.
[ 70 Glowing Warm Lights & Unique Design ] There are 70 warm white LED lights in the 4 gift boxes. Each box is wrapped with glitter yarn on the surface, the lights can pass through the gift box, it will be reflected on the surface, emit a fairy-tale sparkle effect.
[ Power Adapter ] The power adapter comes with a 10 feet long lead wire. With safe 4.5V-0.3A low voltage, the Christmas lighted gift boxes remain cool to touch, no worry about overheat even working all nights.
[ Premium Material, Easy to Fold and Store ] Premium Material. Crafted with PVC materials and supported by a metal framework for stability and sturdiness. 4 Different sizes of gift boxes can be stacked for easy storage, space saving, and reused for next year.
[ Christmas Decor ] Create a festive and Xmas atmosphere anywhere. Suitable for Christmas indoor outdoor decorations, Christmas tree, fireplace, room, window, porch, outdoor, indoor, front door, patio, small tree, bedroom, snow, yard, and multiple scenes.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $152.97 - $137.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:49:43 UTC – Details)



Includes a 1-year subscription to Amazon Kids+: a subscription designed for kids aged 3-12 to safely learn, grow, and explore. On Kindle, kids can have unlimited access to thousands of books, and hundreds of audiobooks. After 1 year, your subscription will automatically renew every month starting at just $4.99/month plus applicable tax. You may cancel at any time by visiting the Amazon Parent Dashboard or contacting Customer Service.
Establish healthy reading habits – kids read, on average, more than an hour a day when they sit down with their Kindle.
Kindle Kids is purpose-built for reading (not a toy)—no apps, videos, or games.
